text: Zelda and Robin Williams | Kevin Winter / Getty Images Zelda and Robin Williams | Kevin Winter / Getty Images Zelda Williams, the only daughter of actor Robin Williams, is celebrating her father ’ s birthday the exact same way she has every year since his death four years ago. Williams took to social media on Thursday, two days before what would have been the comedian ’ s 67th birthday, to reveal how she is continuing to honor him. “ It ’ s that time of year again, ” she wrote alongside a picture of the two of them smiling for the camera at a dinner. “ Everyone who has dealt with loss knows the pain of certain anniversaries, moments full of memory that come round like clockwork and usurp all others, no matter how hard you may try to prepare for or
